# Simple E-commerce Requirements

## Project Overview
Develop a basic e-commerce platform for small businesses to sell products online.

## Stakeholders
- Small business owners (primary users)
- Customers purchasing products
- Payment processing team
- Development team

## Core Requirements

### User Management
- Users must be able to register and create accounts
- Users must be able to login securely
- Users must be able to reset passwords

### Product Catalog
- Business owners must be able to add products with descriptions and prices
- Customers must be able to browse products by category
- Product search functionality must be available

### Shopping Cart
- Customers must be able to add products to shopping cart
- Customers must be able to modify cart contents
- Cart must persist between sessions

### Order Processing
- Customers must be able to place orders
- Order confirmation emails must be sent
- Business owners must be able to view and manage orders

## Technical Constraints
- Must integrate with existing payment gateway
- Must be mobile-responsive
- Must support 100 concurrent users
- Must have 99.5% uptime

## Timeline
- MVP delivery required within 3 months
- Full feature set within 6 months
- Go-live target: Q2 2026

## Success Criteria
- Process 50 orders per day within first month
- Achieve customer satisfaction rating above 4.0/5.0
- Reduce manual order processing by 80%
